Question.Subject: lockerz question plz answer?
Question.Content: now i have 300 ptz which is better to redeem in march redemption? 1)Ratchet & Clank Bundle - PSP 2)DSi Game System - Black 3)Wii Sports with Console - Games included 4)New iPod Touch 8GB ( if i take more 25 ptz ) plz your opinion and if you know tell me when is redemption? (i know in 26 march) thanks

Answer.Content: The chances of you getting any of them are slim to none! Lockerz is a SCAM!
maybe none ...its really hard to get prizes from there from the online traffic
Answer.Reference: have over 34,000 points cant get a prize yet :/

Answer.Content:
3.
-i heard that site was a scaam?
actually u wont take any of these cause the point are gonna be x4 so forget it :D redemption is gonna be after 26 but we will se for other info...

Don't think you will get anything due to lockerz selling out so fast and the prizes are apparently going to be FOUR TIMES what they state on their redeem page!
However you can sign up to Points2Shop and earn points by doing offers and surveys aswell as playing games.
Use my referal link to sign up here : http://www.points2shop.com/?ref=Lesh200
To get me some extra points, I can help you with anything once you are there! Good luck!

Lockerz is not a scam. My friend got a PS3 from it. It is quite likely you might not get it though due to the busy traffic. Personally I would try for the iPod Touch 8GB, I have an iPod Touch 16gb and it is amazing. Its worth a try.
Answer.Reference: A friend and I have an ipod touch.
